page.title: 12CHILDREN-DIFFERENT LANGUAGES
page.content: We went round our school "Whiteknights Junior School" to ask children if, in their family, anyone could speak another language other than English. These were the results. Italian 6, Punjabi 5, Norwegian 3, Urdu 3, Dutch 3, Swedish 2, Hebrew 1, Portuguese 1, Samoan 1, Japanese 1 and Welsh 1. Before the survey we thought that more people would speak a foreign language. We found that some children understood other languages but did not speak them.These were _ French, Hausa, Barbadian dialect, Chinese, Trinidad dialect, Malaysian, Somali, German, Spanish and French.
